homepage.title: Nala Beauty
homepage.subtitle: Nails & Lashes & Pedicure
homepage.description: Welcome to Nala Beauty salon. We do nails, lashes and pedicure in Kaisaniemi -  the heart of Helsinki. Find us at the address Vuorikatu 8A30 Helsinki. We serve you professionally with care. Book your appointment with our professional technician now and get served today!

contact.description: Near the University of Helsinki metro. From the Espresso House (or exit F) you can take the escalator to the upper floor. Then take the stairs to the top floor. At the end of the stairs, go outside and look right

treatments.title: Our services
treatments.description: We implement beauty treatments according to your wishes. Our professional works with a creative and subtle approach.

point1.title: Nails
point1.description: Trendy nails, classic French varnishes, decorative nails or still and natural nails - beautiful and well-kept nails will be noticed! In our selection you can find natural nail manicures, gel polish and spa manicures. We also do structural nails with acrylic and gel. We give 5 days warranty for your nails

point2.title: Lashes
point2.description: We make attractive and high-quality eyelash extensions quickly and neatly. Our services include classic and volume eyelash extensions, hybrid lashes, design lashes, lash lift as well as shaping and coloring of the corners.

point3.title: Pedicure
point3.description: Pamper yourself with a relaxing and caring spa pedicure. Our luxurious spa pedicure includes exfoliation, nail care and gel polish. Varnishing can also be done with gel according to wishes. Our foot care is done in massaging spa chairs, which guarantees a relaxing experience.

treatments.button: Book your appointment now and get yourself treated with us

giftcard.title: A gift card to a beauty salon
giftcard.description: The most pampering gift idea for the holidays is a gift card to Nala Beauty. A gift card to a beauty salon is a classic gift that brings a good mood and feeling, this gift will not disappoint! You can buy a gift card for yourself or your loved one in our salon.
